attributes.action: Pass a Law to remove any Vehicles from the Highways which Create Excess Noise.
attributes.additional_details:
It is Stupid to have a Law which Never gets enforced, they need to stop the Loophole on this and Seal the system to Prevent Abuse, Some Areas it’s a Pain in the Neck as many know, we have had these issues at the Retail Park with many Complaints from the Elderly.

Let’s make things Legal again with an Enforcement System.

Common Sense
attributes.background: Today more and more Vehicles have Exhausts changed to Create more Noise, this creates Noise in Quiet Roads, it is an Offence to make any Vehicles louder than first produced, But the Police are Not Trained to deal with it, it is known that Youths Change Exhausts over and back at the Mot stage, Wrong.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
We understand that you're concerned about loud vehicles, but we're not sure whether you'd like a new law or better enforcement of the current laws.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Alternatively, you might be interested in signing this petition calling for engine noise emissions to be tested during MOTs:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220264

You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.
